title: Joe's Men's Classic Fit Straight Leg Jean
description: The name says it all. It's a straight-leg jean with a 32" inseam and an easy fit from hip to ankle
Our Classic fit in Mahrez has a timeless shade made from stretch denim with five-pocket construction

The name says it all. It's a straight-leg jean with a 32" inseam and an easy fit from hip to ankle. Our Classic fit in Taiyo is cut from comfortable stretch denim and features five-pocket construction defined, washed-down character.
